backend/main.mo: Defines core actor logic for user profiles, jobs, applications, messaging, ratings, notifications, and login/setup workflow with access control and approval state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a frontend-wide phone number replacement and listing affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains autogenerated summaries of key frontend components, pages, hooks, and configuration files.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app routing, authentication, profile setup handling, and portal selection logic with global WhatsApp button and layout components.
frontend/src/components/candidate/Candid: Candidate profile view and editor with fields, CV upload, and application status display.
frontend/src/components/candidate/ChatTa: Messaging interface allowing candidates to view conversations and send messages to employers.
frontend/src/components/candidate/Employ: Placeholder employer directory card indicating the feature is coming soon.
frontend/src/components/candidate/JobSea: Job search UI with filtering, job listings, and an application flow including CV submission.
frontend/src/components/employer/Candida: Employer tool to search candidates by department and location and view matching profiles.
frontend/src/components/employer/Employe: Provides a messaging UI for employers to view conversation partners, select a user, read messages, and send new messages.
Displays and edits an employer’s profile with fields for company details and contact information.
frontend/src/components/employer/JobMana: Allows employers to create, edit, delete, and view applications for their job postings.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component showing branding, navigation links, and contact info using CONTACT constants plus social links.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with branding, login/logout flow, navigation, admin access, mobile menu, and profile dropdown rendering based on user state.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for initial candidate or employer profile setup with form fields, CV upload, and registration submission.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppButton.t: Floating WhatsApp contact button that appears after a delay and opens a predefined chat link.
frontend/src/constants/contact.ts: Exports centralized contact information including phone, WhatsApp, email, and location.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, creation of AuthClient, and provides login/logout utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for interacting with backend functions such as login, profiles, jobs, applications, messages, and ratings.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme variables for light/dark mode, and custom styles including a floating WhatsApp button with animations and responsive tweaks.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Empty page placeholder with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPortal.tsx: Implements an admin dashboard with authentication checks, data fetching, tabbed views, and admin actions such as deleting records and exporting analytics.
frontend/src/pages/CandidatePortal.tsx: Provides a tabbed interface for candidates to browse jobs, employers, chats, and profile details.
frontend/src/pages/EmployerPortal.tsx: Provides a tabbed interface for employers to manage jobs, search candidates, chat, and edit their profile.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Renders the marketing landing page with service categories and login flows for candidates and employers.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Displays the site’s privacy policy using styled cards outlining data collection, usage, and security practices.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Empty page placeholder with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/TermsOfServicePage.ts: React page rendering the Terms of Service with multiple sections using Card components and static text content.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON file describing project metadata, feature history, and a pending request to update phone numbers across the frontend.
